snippet: The actor Gbenga Akinnagbe was a troubled young man before he became involved in the sport of wrestling during his junior year in high school in Maryland.
abstract: Box Seats column by actor Gbenga Akinnagbe describes how wrestling saved his life as a troubled young man in Maryland.
lead_paragraph: The actor Gbenga Akinnagbe was a troubled young man before he became involved in the sport of wrestling during his junior year in high school in Maryland.

headline.seo: For Gbenga Akinnagbe, a Metamorphosis on the Wrestling Mat
headline.main: A Metamorphosis on the Wrestling Mat
headline.print_headline: A Metamorphosis On the Wrestling Mat
